text: The 2024 NFL season was the 105th season of the National Football League (NFL). The season began on September 5, 2024, with Super Bowl champion Kansas City Chiefs winning against Baltimore Ravens in the NFL Kickoff Game. And the regular season ended on January 5, 2025. The playoffs began on January 11, 2025, and ended with Super Bowl LIX on February 9, 2025 at Caesars Superdome in New Orleans, Louisiana. The Philadelphia Eagles won the Super Bowl against the two time defending champion Kansas City Chiefs 40-22. ==Regular season standings== ===Division=== ==Postseason== ===Bracket=== Category:National Football League seasons Category:2024 in sports
title: 2024 NFL season
